"Rasta":
"That new Mag...
You're a Meteorn, aren't you?"
"There's something I'd like to ask you. Are you free?"
"Meteorn Mags are more advanced than ours, so you should have an easier time getting back in touch with him."
"Would you please go and find out what's happened? I'd really appreciate it."

"I see. You must be very busy...
Until next time."
